00001 #if !defined( CUBOID_H )
00002 #define CUBOID_H
00003 #pragma once
00004 #include <afxtempl.h>

00008 class CNewVisionDoc;
00009 
00010 // Cuboid is a cuboid (paralellopiped) in image coordinates 
00011 // representing static store fixtures on the floor that might occlude the object being tracked
00012 // p1,p2,p3 represent the base of the fixture (z=0), while p4 gives the height
00013 class Cuboid : public Obstacle {
00014     DECLARE_DYNAMIC(Cuboid)
00015 public:
00016     // local pointers to external structures
00017     static const int NPTS = 8;
00018     CvPoint3D32f v[NPTS]; // contains all 8 cuboid vertices for speed considerations
00019     Cuboid(void);
00020     Cuboid(CvPoint2D32f p1, CNewVisionDoc* doc);
00021     Cuboid(const Cuboid&);
00022     Cuboid& operator=(const Cuboid& that);
00023     ~Cuboid(void);
00024 
00025     void GetOccludedFloorArea(CvSeq* points);
00026     CvPoint3D32f GetCenter();
00027 
00028     bool Move(CvPoint3D32f p);
00029     bool Move1(CvPoint2D32f p);
00030     bool Move2(CvPoint2D32f p);
00031     bool Move3(CvPoint2D32f p);
00032     bool Move4(CvPoint2D32f p);
00033 
00034 
00035     void DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color); 
00036     void DrawFloor(CDC* pDC, int ox, int oy, CPen* pen);
00037     void DrawFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color);
00038     void DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen);
00039     
00040     virtual double GetDistanceFromCamera(); // distance from camera center in centimeters
00041     virtual void RasterizeFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color=CV_RGB(255,255,255)); 
00042     virtual void RasterizeFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color=CV_RGB(255,255,255)); 
00043     void Serialize( CArchive& archive );
00044 
00045     bool IsFramePointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent);
00046     bool IsFloorPointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent);
00047 };
00048 #endif // !defined( CUBOID_H )
